comment: "Managing editor told me the Q&A would go online soon and be in one of the next few issues. The next issue, it's on the cover. If I would've known that before, I would've 1. made it longer and 2. asked for more (the editor even asked me if I was expecting to get paid for the story!)"
relationship: Submission/spec (piece was written prior and then submitted for publication)
Ongoing/pre-existing relationship with editor or publication
